metadata.name: Blackjack Dealer
metadata.description:
[h1] Time to fuel your gambling addiction with the Blackjack Dealer [/h1]
This mod adds a blackjack dealer beggar to the game.
The Dealer spawns by replacing an already existing slot machine or beggar. By default, the spawn chance is 50% in arcade rooms and 0% in other rooms, however, that can be changed in the config.
To access the config, press [b]C[/b]. Note that you do [b]not[/b] need Mod Config Menu - everything is included!
You can play blackjack by walking up to the Dealer. There you will select your bet (1, 3, 5 or 10 coins). Each bet has a different reward pool - if you manage to [b]win[/b] the game, you will be granted a reward from the pool.
How to play blackjack? Check discussions
Reward pools can be found [url=https://pastebin.com/p3HCp7nR]here[/url]
Special thanks to: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/goncholito0/]Goncholito[/url] for the paper background sprite [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/discowy20/]Discowy[/url] for help with other sprites and balancing [url=https://github.com/Meowlala/DeadSeaScrollsMenu]DeadInfinity[/url]for creating and maintaining DSS
You can check this mod's github repo [url=https://github.com/ddeeddii/tboi_blackjack_dealer] here [/url]
